name: Soothing FootSalve - Mint 3oz Jar
description:
Soothing salve that makes even the roughest feet feel better soon!
Made in my very own kitchen.  There are so many uses for this salve:
Cools sunburn, great for insect bites, and helps heal scrapes and scratches. (not to be used on cuts)

Nana's Soothing Foot Salve is soft and soothing with a hint of mint.

Natural ingredients include: Olive Oil, Grape Seed Oil, Almond Oil, Lanolin, Chamomile, Calendula, Comfrey Leaf, Mint, Beeswax and a big helping of LOVE. 
Sold in 3 oz balm jars.

name: Vegan Soaps - All Natural - Pick from 5 Styles
description:
All natural vegan soaps.

Chamomile Neroli (Vegan, All Natural) Classic essential oil blend of sweet, floral chamomile, blended with Neroli and Petitgrain for a delightfully sweet and floral treat. Made with ground chamomile flowers and has a light exfoliation effect. Ingredients: Organic Sunflower oil, Shea Butter, (Natural) Fragrance, Chamomile Powder. -------------------------------------------------------------- Champaka (Vegan, All Natural) Sweet, earthy and rich floral notes and light powdery incense smell. Ingredients: Olive Oil, Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil, Sunflower Oil, Shea Butter, Fragrance, Annatto Powder, Black Walnut Powder. -------------------------------------------------------------- Patchouli Vanilla Hemp (Vegan, All Natural) Earthy Patchouli and Sweet Vanilla combine with natural hemp oil. Ingredients: Olive Oil, Hemp Oil, Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil, Sunflower Oil, Shea Butter, Patchouli Essential Oil, (Natural) Fragrance, Clay. -------------------------------------------------------------- Sandalwood Vanilla (Vegan, All Natural) Sweet, earthy sandalwood, with rich sweet vanilla. Ingredients: Olive Oil, Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil, Sunflower Oil, Shea Butter, Fragrance. ---------------------------------------------------------------- Tea Tree Soap (Vegan, All Natural) Tea Tree oil is a great anti bacterial. Good for acne. Ingredients: Olive Oil, Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil, Sunflower Oil, Shea Butter, Tea Tree Essential Oil, Cajeput Essential Oil, Parsley Powder. ------------------- Price is per bar. Save on shipping by ordering multiple bars. Average bar size is 3 to 4.5 ounces.

name: Goat Milk Soaps with Shea Butter
description: Handmade Goat Milk Soaps with Shea Butter It is Extra Mild Soap! Goat milk soap is far less drying and harsh than ordinary soap. Great for those who have sensitive skin or eczema. Several bars of each still available! ----- Eucalyptus and Spearmint Ingredients: Soybean Oil, Coconut Oil, Goat Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Water, Shea butter, Fragrance, and Mint Leaves. Cold Processed Soap. (one 4 oz bar) Eucalyptus and Spearmint 8 available ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Sweetest Orange (one 4 oz bar) Ingredients: Soybean Oil, Coconut Oil, Goat Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Water, Shea butter, Essential Oil, and Orange Peel. Cold Processed. Sweetest Orange 10 available ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ English Rose Ingredients: Soybean Oil, Coconut Oil, Goat Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Water, Shea butter, Fragrance, and Rose Petals. Cold Process Soap. (one 4 oz bar) English Rose 9 available ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Sweet Pea Ingredients: Soybean Oil, Coconut Oil, Goat Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Water, Shea butter, and Fragrance. Cold Process Soap. (one 4 oz bar) Sweet Pea 8 available ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Oatmeal and Honey Ingredients: Soybean Oil, Coconut Oil, Goat Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Water, Shea butter, Oatmeal and Honey. Cold Process Soaps. (one 4 oz bar) Oatmeal and Honey 8 available ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Woodberry 8 available Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil, Fresh Goat Milk, Sunflower Oil, Shea Butter, Fragrance. May Also Contain Tocopherols (natural vitamin e) and Stearic Acid (vegetable source). Rich grapefruit, sweet berries and the deeper note of earthy wood in our rich fresh goat milk soap blend. (4 oz bars) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Unscented Castile 9 available Ingredients: Olive Oil, Water, Sodium Hydroxide and Goat Milk. Castile is made from 100% Olive Oil and adding goat milk for a harder, even more luxurious bar for the most sensitive skin. (4 oz bar) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Pear and Redwood 8 available Pear & Redwood Ingredients: Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Soy Oil, Fresh Goat Milk, Sunflower Oil, Shea Butter, Fragrance. May Also Contain Tocopherols (natural vitamin e) and Stearic Acid (vegetable source). Sweet ripe fruit, deep wood and musk with a touch of florals. (4 oz bar)

name: Homespun Homemade Laundry Detergent
description:
Homemade just like early settlers did in the United States.  Made with natural soap base so it cleans and refreshens each load.  Great for whites, colors, and delicates.

Detergent is made to order so it doesn't dry out.

Recommended directions call for 2 level tablespoons per load but you can adjust as you need.  1 level tablespoon is a good measure for small loads.

Natural soaps are good for removing oils, odors and even work good for removing oils from posion ivy which can last on clothes for weeks!

All natural, no added perfumes or oils.

What's included?  Over 1 pound of detergent handmade with love!

Ingredients:  soap base, sodium palmate, sodium carbonate, and sodium borate

name: Dried Lavender Flowers - Chemical-Free - 2 ounce
description:
Dried Lavender Flowers

Just some of the many uses for this wonderful flower:
Great for Teas - 100% Chemical-Free
Ingredient for sleep pillows
Potpourri and Sachets
Tea
Insect Repellent
Soap
Incense
Scented Waters
